analysis.description:
ERC20dex.collect_main_fee (/unique_chucks/15/0x1c1de57cc864072f7eab381c4c06b14a6963dd4b.sol) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- require(owner.send(main_fee)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x1c1de57cc864072f7eab381c4c06b14a6963dd4b.sol)

	External calls:
	- require(shitcoin.transfer(make.owner,send_to_maker)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x1c1de57cc864072f7eab381c4c06b14a6963dd4b.sol#324-326)
	- require(shitcoin.transfer(take.owner,send_to_taker)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x1c1de57cc864072f7eab381c4c06b14a6963dd4b.sol#350-351)
